alert.note: Alert for Warren (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 12 at 9:27PM EDT until August 12 at 11:30PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of east central New York and eastern New York, including the following counties, in east central New York, Warren. In eastern New York, Hamilton and Herkimer. * WHEN...Until 1130 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 927 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Indian Lake, Speculator, Old Forge, Lake Pleasant, Inlet, Eighth Lake Campground, Lewey Lake Campground, Limekiln Lake Campground, Moffitt Beach Campground, Eagle Bay, Alger Island Public Campground, Nicks Lake Campground, McKeever, West Canada Lakes, Kamp Kill Kare, Sled Harbor, Sagamore, Sagamore Lake, Caswell Lake and Perkins Clearing. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
